* Add axiomatic semantic reranking: the algorithm supports either reranking using the same index with the original ranking and reranking using an external index (e.g. commercial search engine snippets or Wikipedia).

Patch to fix issue #300 - errors building fatjar for pyjnius (#302)

This patch basically reverts commit 2c76f3c which breaks fatjar generation for pyjnius.

Maven now by default builds the fatjar, but appassembler needs to be explicitly triggered. So the full Maven command is now back to: mvn clean package appassembler:assemble

Add -dumpAllDocids and -dumpRawDocs options to IndexUtils (#310)

POC of simplified regression test script and usage (#286)

In this PR, a new script `src/main/python/run_regression.py` and the expected results in `src/main/resources/regression/all.yaml` are introduced. 
This script is going to be the single regression test script for all collections (via different parameters). 
The idea is to separate "what to test" (in yaml file) and "how to test" (the script).
Currently, only the results of disk12 and cw09 are included but the initial POC seems promising. 
I temporarily name all current `experiments-*.md` as `experiments-*-old.md` and change the corresponding regression test scripts in `src/main/python/run_regression_*.py`
We will migrate all other collections to the new regression test script in another PR.
Add ndeval and related qrels for web track 2013-2014 (#337)

Regression test refactor (#355)

This is a complete refactor of the regression test framework.

# All the to-be-validated numbers are in src/main/resources/regression/*.yaml. One file per collection.
# Now all experiments-*.md are automatically generated by `mvn test` or `mvn clean package appassembler:assemble`. Any manual changes will be erased. The only way to change them is to directly change `src/main/resources/regression/*.yaml`.
# Please note that for CW12 there is no result of BM25+AX and QL+AX since it takes too long to run the test.

Fix score overflow issue in ScoreTiesAdjusterReranker for SPLADEv2 (#1658)

The method of rounding used in ScoreTiesAdjusterReranker causes overflow issues
because SPLADEv2 scores can get very big. Doesn't affect the actual ordering of
docs, hence everything is fine with MS MARCO output format, but does cause issues
with TREC format and trec_eval.

With this bug fixed, added SPLADEv2 regressions.
